articles.title: Law firms Allen & Overy and Shearman & Sterling plan merger - Reuters
articles.description: London-based law firm Allen & Overy and New York's Shearman & Sterling plan to merge, they announced on Sunday, in a deal that would create one of the world's largest legal practices with combined global revenue of approximately $3.4 billion.
articles.content: May 21 (Reuters) - London-based law firm Allen & Overy and New York's Shearman & Sterling plan to merge, they announced on Sunday, in a deal that would create one of the world's largest legal… [+1994 chars]

articles.title: 'Boomy' talk about the Chinese economy is a charade - Financial Times
articles.description: Wall Street forecasts are now even more optimistic than Beijing’s unreachable growth target
articles.content:
The writer is chair of Rockefeller International
Something is rotten in the Chinese economy, but dont expect Wall Street analysts to tell you about it.

articles.author: Sam Lyman
articles.title: Ripple Effects From SEC Suit Could Strengthen Coinbase Litigation - Forbes
articles.description: In the SEC v. Ripple case, the Hinman documents could vindicate Ripple and XRP, in addition to boosting Coinbase's own litigation.
articles.content: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse has said the Hinman emails related to the SEC lawsuit will "shock" the ... [+] public once they are released. These same documents could strengthen Coinbase's own legal c… [+5108 chars]
